text: dau che neah haey yeung ban chhlaeyotb nung kar buongsuong som robsa ke haey yeung ban bratan yah yea aoy ke haey yeung ban pyeabeal phriyea robsa ke aoy ke( meankaun) . pitabrakd nasa puokke svaheab knong kar sang ampeula haey puokke buongsuong som mk champoh yeung daoy kdei sangkhum ning kaotakhlach . haey puokke kuchea anak del ban aonlomton mk champoh yeung
